  • This is Akodo Chris, the operator of this page. There's not much here yet, but there will be in the (hopefully) near future. There are a few links. E-mail any army lists, strategy ideas, etc. that you have, and I will post them and give you full credit. Check out the Discussion Board while you're here, it's just starting but hopefully enough people will post and make it worthwhile.
